fields.name: AdFqdn
fields.description: Specifies the AD fully qualified display name.

fields.name: AgentConfiguration
fields.description: Configurable properties that the user can set locally via the azcmagent config command, or remotely via ARM.

fields.name: AgentVersion
fields.description: The hybrid machine agent full version.

fields.name: ClientPublicKey
fields.description: Public Key that the client provides to be used during initial resource onboarding

fields.name: CloudMetadata
fields.description: The metadata of the cloud environment (Azure/GCP/AWS/OCI...).

fields.name: DetectedProperties
fields.description: Detected properties from the machine.

fields.name: DisplayName
fields.description: Specifies the hybrid machine display name.

fields.name: DnsFqdn
fields.description: Specifies the DNS fully qualified display name.

fields.name: DomainName
fields.description: Specifies the Windows domain name.

fields.name: ErrorDetails
fields.description: Details about the error state.

fields.name: Extensions
fields.description: Machine Extensions information (deprecated field)

fields.name: LastStatusChange
fields.description: The time of the last status change.

fields.name: MachineFqdn
fields.description: Specifies the hybrid machine FQDN.

fields.name: MssqlDiscovered
fields.description: Specifies whether any MS SQL instance is discovered on the machine.

fields.name: OsName
fields.description: The Operating System running on the hybrid machine.

fields.name: OsProfile
fields.description: Specifies the operating system settings for the hybrid machine.

fields.name: OsSku
fields.description: Specifies the Operating System product SKU.

fields.name: OsType
fields.description: The type of Operating System (windows/linux).

fields.name: OsVersion
fields.description: The version of Operating System running on the hybrid machine.

fields.name: ParentClusterResourceId
fields.description: The resource id of the parent cluster (Azure HCI) this machine is assigned to, if any.

fields.name: PrivateLinkScopeResourceId
fields.description: The resource id of the private link scope this machine is assigned to, if any.

fields.name: ProvisioningState
fields.description: The provisioning state, which only appears in the response.

fields.name: ServiceStatuses
fields.description: Statuses of dependent services that are reported back to ARM.

fields.name: Status
fields.description: The status of the hybrid machine agent.

fields.name: VMId
fields.description: Specifies the hybrid machine unique ID.

fields.name: VMUuid
fields.description: Specifies the Arc Machine's unique SMBIOS ID
